details: One is seen in a battle [at the background of the of the Pokémon Scarlet and Violet's international website](https://web.archive.org/web/20220228042125/https://scarletviolet.pokemon.com/assets/img/global/screens/8-2x.jpg).
One can be seen using what appears to be Petal Blizzard in the [second trailer](https://youtube.com/watch?v=TkolOdAX5_I&t=1m53s).

One is seen in a battle [at the background of the Pokémon Scarlet and Violet's international website](https://scarletviolet.pokemon.com/assets/img/global/screens/8-2x.jpg).

A shadowy figure appears in a red CD cover inside the player's house in the [announcement trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAmueMsFR1o&t=138s), but it is disputed whether it represents a Mimikyu or a Pikachu.
Appears in a purple CD cover inside the player's house in the [announcement trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAmueMsFR1o&t=138s).
